short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds and highlights specified text on web pages.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your browsing experience with our Chrome Extension, designed to automatically find and highlight key words and phrases on web pages based on your personalized lists. Perfect for users of the PubHive Navigator Platform, this tool boosts literature review workflow and productivity by organizing your search terms into manageable groups and lists, all stored securely and globally.

Key Features:
- Customizable Keyword Highlighting: Effortlessly highlight unlimited words and phrases on any webpage according to predefined lists.

- Dynamic Content Refresh: Highlights automatically update with page reloads and content changes, ensuring consistent visibility.

- Browser Synchronization: Keep your keyword lists synchronized across multiple browsers for a seamless research experience.

- Color-Coded Organization: Create and manage color-coded keyword lists to distinguish between different search terms easily.

- Flexible Control Options: Customize your experience with options to disable highlighting for specific lists or web pages.

Discover how our Chrome Extension can simplify your online research and reading by automatically marking important text in your current browser tab. Dive into advanced settings for more customization and control over your browsing environment. Perfect for researcher who require efficient and streamlined web navigation
